20  package org.elasticsearch.index.cache.bitset;
21  
22  import com.google.common.cache.Cache;
23  import com.google.common.cache.CacheBuilder;
24  import com.google.common.cache.RemovalListener;
25  import com.google.common.cache.RemovalNotification;
26  import org.apache.lucene.index.LeafReader;
27  import org.apache.lucene.index.LeafReaderContext;
28  import org.apache.lucene.search.DocIdSet;
29  import org.apache.lucene.search.DocIdSetIterator;
30  import org.apache.lucene.search.Filter;
31  import org.apache.lucene.search.join.BitDocIdSetFilter;
32  import org.apache.lucene.util.BitDocIdSet;
33  import org.apache.lucene.util.SparseFixedBitSet;
34  import org.elasticsearch.ElasticsearchException;
35  import org.elasticsearch.ExceptionsHelper;
36  import org.elasticsearch.cluster.metadata.IndexMetaData;
37  import org.elasticsearch.common.inject.Inject;
38  import org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.search.NoCacheFilter;
39  import org.elasticsearch.common.settings.Settings;
40  import org.elasticsearch.common.unit.TimeValue;
41  import org.elasticsearch.index.AbstractIndexComponent;
42  import org.elasticsearch.index.Index;
43  import org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.DocumentMapper;
44  import org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.MapperService;
45  import org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.object.ObjectMapper;
46  import org.elasticsearch.index.search.nested.NonNestedDocsFilter;
47  import org.elasticsearch.index.IndexService;
48  import org.elasticsearch.index.settings.IndexSettings;
49  import org.elasticsearch.index.shard.ShardId;
50  import org.elasticsearch.index.shard.ShardUtils;
51  import org.elasticsearch.index.shard.IndexShard;
52  import org.elasticsearch.indices.IndicesWarmer;
53  import org.elasticsearch.indices.IndicesWarmer.TerminationHandle;
54  import org.elasticsearch.threadpool.ThreadPool;
55  
56  import java.io.Closeable;
57  import java.io.IOException;
58  import java.util.HashSet;
59  import java.util.Map;
60  import java.util.Set;
61  import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
62  import java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch;
63  import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
64  import java.util.concurrent.Executor;
65  
66  /**
67   * This is a cache for {@link BitDocIdSet} based filters and is unbounded by size or time.
68   * <p/>
69   * Use this cache with care, only components that require that a filter is to be materialized as a {@link BitDocIdSet}
70   * and require that it should always be around should use this cache, otherwise the
71   * {@link org.elasticsearch.index.cache.filter.FilterCache} should be used instead.
72   */
73  public class BitsetFilterCache extends AbstractIndexComponent implements LeafReader.CoreClosedListener, RemovalListener<Object, Cache<Filter, BitsetFilterCache.Value>>, Closeable {
74  
75      public static final String LOAD_RANDOM_ACCESS_FILTERS_EAGERLY = "index.load_fixed_bitset_filters_eagerly";
76  
77      private final boolean loadRandomAccessFiltersEagerly;
78      private final Cache<Object, Cache<Filter, Value>> loadedFilters;
79      private final BitDocIdSetFilterWarmer warmer;
80  
81      private IndexService indexService;
82      private IndicesWarmer indicesWarmer;
83  
84      @Inject
85      public BitsetFilterCache(Index index, @IndexSettings Settings indexSettings) {
86          super(index, indexSettings);
87          this.loadRandomAccessFiltersEagerly = indexSettings.getAsBoolean(LOAD_RANDOM_ACCESS_FILTERS_EAGERLY, true);
88          this.loadedFilters = CacheBuilder.newBuilder().removalListener(this).build();
89          this.warmer = new BitDocIdSetFilterWarmer();
90      }
91  
92      @Inject(optional = true)
93      public void setIndicesWarmer(IndicesWarmer indicesWarmer) {
94          this.indicesWarmer = indicesWarmer;
95      }
96  
97      public void setIndexService(IndexService indexService) {
98          this.indexService = indexService;
99          // First the indicesWarmer is set and then the indexService is set, because of this there is a small window of
100         // time where indexService is null. This is why the warmer should only registered after indexService has been set.
101         // Otherwise there is a small chance of the warmer running into a NPE, since it uses the indexService
102         indicesWarmer.addListener(warmer);
103     }
104 
105     public BitDocIdSetFilter getBitDocIdSetFilter(Filter filter) {
106         assert filter != null;
107         assert !(filter instanceof NoCacheFilter);
108         return new BitDocIdSetFilterWrapper(filter);
109     }
110 
111     @Override
112     public void onClose(Object ownerCoreCacheKey) {
113         loadedFilters.invalidate(ownerCoreCacheKey);
114     }
115 
116     @Override
117     public void close() throws ElasticsearchException {
118         indicesWarmer.removeListener(warmer);
119         clear("close");
120     }
121 
122     public void clear(String reason) {
123         logger.debug("clearing all bitsets because [{}]", reason);
124         loadedFilters.invalidateAll();
125     }
126 
127     private BitDocIdSet getAndLoadIfNotPresent(final Filter filter, final LeafReaderContext context) throws IOException, ExecutionException {
128         final Object coreCacheReader = context.reader().getCoreCacheKey();
129         final ShardId shardId = ShardUtils.extractShardId(context.reader());
130         Cache<Filter, Value> filterToFbs = loadedFilters.get(coreCacheReader, new Callable<Cache<Filter, Value>>() {
131             @Override
132             public Cache<Filter, Value> call() throws Exception {
133                 context.reader().addCoreClosedListener(BitsetFilterCache.this);
134                 return CacheBuilder.newBuilder().build();
135             }
136         });
137         return filterToFbs.get(filter, new Callable<Value>() {
138             @Override
139             public Value call() throws Exception {
140                 DocIdSet docIdSet = filter.getDocIdSet(context, null);
141                 final BitDocIdSet bitSet;
142                 if (docIdSet instanceof BitDocIdSet) {
143                     bitSet = (BitDocIdSet) docIdSet;
144                 } else {
145                     BitDocIdSet.Builder builder = new BitDocIdSet.Builder(context.reader().maxDoc());
146                     if (docIdSet != null && docIdSet != DocIdSet.EMPTY) {
147                         DocIdSetIterator iterator = docIdSet.iterator();
148                         // some filters (QueryWrapperFilter) return not null or DocIdSet.EMPTY if there no matching docs
149                         if (iterator != null) {
150                             builder.or(iterator);
151                         }
152                     }
153                     BitDocIdSet bits = builder.build();
154                     // code expects this to be non-null
155                     if (bits == null) {
156                         bits = new BitDocIdSet(new SparseFixedBitSet(context.reader().maxDoc()), 0);
157                     }
158                     bitSet = bits;
159                 }
160 
161                 Value value = new Value(bitSet, shardId);
162                 if (shardId != null) {
163                     IndexShard shard = indexService.shard(shardId.id());
164                     if (shard != null) {
165                         shard.shardBitsetFilterCache().onCached(value.bitset.ramBytesUsed());
166                     }
167                 }
168                 return value;
169             }
170         }).bitset;
171     }
172 
173     @Override
174     public void onRemoval(RemovalNotification<Object, Cache<Filter, Value>> notification) {
175         Object key = notification.getKey();
176         if (key == null) {
177             return;
178         }
179 
180         Cache<Filter, Value> value = notification.getValue();
181         if (value == null) {
182             return;
183         }
184 
185         for (Map.Entry<Filter, Value> entry : value.asMap().entrySet()) {
186             if (entry.getValue().shardId == null) {
187                 continue;
188             }
189             IndexShard shard = indexService.shard(entry.getValue().shardId.id());
190             if (shard != null) {
191                 ShardBitsetFilterCache shardBitsetFilterCache = shard.shardBitsetFilterCache();
192                 shardBitsetFilterCache.onRemoval(entry.getValue().bitset.ramBytesUsed());
193             }
194             // if null then this means the shard has already been removed and the stats are 0 anyway for the shard this key belongs to
195         }
196     }
197 
198     public static final class Value {
199 
200         final BitDocIdSet bitset;
201         final ShardId shardId;
202 
203         public Value(BitDocIdSet bitset, ShardId shardId) {
204             this.bitset = bitset;
205             this.shardId = shardId;
206         }
207     }
208 
209     final class BitDocIdSetFilterWrapper extends BitDocIdSetFilter {
210 
211         final Filter filter;
212 
213         BitDocIdSetFilterWrapper(Filter filter) {
214             this.filter = filter;
215         }
216 
217         @Override
218         public BitDocIdSet getDocIdSet(LeafReaderContext context) throws IOException {
219             try {
220                 return getAndLoadIfNotPresent(filter, context);
221             } catch (ExecutionException e) {
222                 throw ExceptionsHelper.convertToElastic(e);
223             }
224         }
225 
226         @Override
227         public String toString(String field) {
228             return "random_access(" + filter + ")";
229         }
230 
231         @Override
232         public boolean equals(Object o) {
233             if (!(o instanceof BitDocIdSetFilterWrapper)) return false;
234             return this.filter.equals(((BitDocIdSetFilterWrapper) o).filter);
235         }
236 
237         @Override
238         public int hashCode() {
239             return filter.hashCode() ^ 0x1117BF26;
240         }
241     }
242 
243     final class BitDocIdSetFilterWarmer extends IndicesWarmer.Listener {
244 
245         @Override
246         public IndicesWarmer.TerminationHandle warmNewReaders(final IndexShard indexShard, IndexMetaData indexMetaData, IndicesWarmer.WarmerContext context, ThreadPool threadPool) {
247             if (!loadRandomAccessFiltersEagerly) {
248                 return TerminationHandle.NO_WAIT;
249             }
250 
251             boolean hasNested = false;
252             final Set<Filter> warmUp = new HashSet<>();
253             final MapperService mapperService = indexShard.mapperService();
254             for (DocumentMapper docMapper : mapperService.docMappers(false)) {
255                 if (docMapper.hasNestedObjects()) {
256                     hasNested = true;
257                     for (ObjectMapper objectMapper : docMapper.objectMappers().values()) {
258                         if (objectMapper.nested().isNested()) {
259                             ObjectMapper parentObjectMapper = docMapper.findParentObjectMapper(objectMapper);
260                             if (parentObjectMapper != null && parentObjectMapper.nested().isNested()) {
261                                 warmUp.add(parentObjectMapper.nestedTypeFilter());
262                             }
263                         }
264                     }
265                 }
266             }
267 
268             if (hasNested) {
269                 warmUp.add(NonNestedDocsFilter.INSTANCE);
270             }
271 
272             final Executor executor = threadPool.executor(executor());
273             final CountDownLatch latch = new CountDownLatch(context.searcher().reader().leaves().size() * warmUp.size());
274             for (final LeafReaderContext ctx : context.searcher().reader().leaves()) {
275                 for (final Filter filterToWarm : warmUp) {
276                     executor.execute(new Runnable() {
277 
278                         @Override
279                         public void run() {
280                             try {
281                                 final long start = System.nanoTime();
282                                 getAndLoadIfNotPresent(filterToWarm, ctx);
283                                 if (indexShard.warmerService().logger().isTraceEnabled()) {
284                                     indexShard.warmerService().logger().trace("warmed bitset for [{}], took [{}]", filterToWarm, TimeValue.timeValueNanos(System.nanoTime() - start));
285                                 }
286                             } catch (Throwable t) {
287                                 indexShard.warmerService().logger().warn("failed to load bitset for [{}]", t, filterToWarm);
288                             } finally {
289                                 latch.countDown();
290                             }
291                         }
292 
293                     });
294                 }
295             }
296             return new TerminationHandle() {
297                 @Override
298                 public void awaitTermination() throws InterruptedException {
299                     latch.await();
300                 }
301             };
302         }
303 
304         @Override
305         public TerminationHandle warmTopReader(IndexShard indexShard, IndexMetaData indexMetaData, IndicesWarmer.WarmerContext context, ThreadPool threadPool) {
306             return TerminationHandle.NO_WAIT;
307         }
308 
309     }
310 
311     Cache<Object, Cache<Filter, Value>> getLoadedFilters() {
312         return loadedFilters;
313     }
314 }
